==== Notes ====
===== Sound =====
Sound works, but alsamixer does not.
<pre>
$ alsamixer 

alsamixer: function snd_mixer_load failed: No such file or directory
</pre>

===== BIOS =====
* Please download the latest BIOS update from the Toshiba website.  Hot keys do not work at all without the latest BIOS update.
